text: Another design for a #COVID19 #vaccine - virus-like particle (VLP) that displays the receptor-binding domain (RBD) of #SARSCoV2 “spike”. #SARSCoV2 uses this Spike RBD to bind & enter host cells. EM structure of the VLP that will bind RBD determined (PDB ID 7B3Y). #pdb50 https://t.co/0QEYFpNm8E
